attributes.action: Make all dog owners, regardless of dog breed, be responsible for their dog's behaviour
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
All dog owners should be legally responsible for the actions of their dog.  The Dog owner will be treated as if they personally commited the crime against another person.

All dogs should be micro-chipped.  

Anyone found owning a dog without a microchip should be  fined and have the dog removed until such time as they pay for the microchip to be implanted. 
 
Anyone not keeping the dog owners' register up to date will be personally liable for the actions of the dog.
